title: i was in a match with a yi an i was yas he said yas is more op then yi
body: i flipped my shoot when i heard this i was like  what do u have a brain but i was you know playing top yas an he said 'why do you have a skin for yas' an i asked him why does he have a skin for yi his reply 'cause i can play him' i lost brain cells XD anyway whos more op who takes more skill yi or yas?

replies.body: Yi is more op in my opinion. Yasuo requires skills to actually set up plays and you always need a source of knockup before ult while Yi is basically just REQ and so on. Even though both are op I still say that yi is more op since he is easier to play and you will get results more easily

> [{quoted}](name=iAkeno,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=n67N5WqG,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-01-13T05:42:03.980+0000)
>
> Yi is more op in my opinion. Yasuo requires skills to actually set up plays and you always need a source of knockup before ult while Yi is basically just REQ and so on. Even though both are op I still say that yi is more op since he is easier to play and you will get results more easily

yi legit only has 1 thing that does something the rest are kinda passivess

Yasuo and Yi are both not OP... except maybe Yi with his true damage and crits. Overall Yasuo has a much more reliable game than Yi, because Yi is useless to his team even if he gets fed. Sure Master Yi can do tons on damage, but Yasuo has team orientated utility.

Whatever your opinion, you don't really need to post this on the boards because you had a salty Yi main on your team. Yasuo does take much more skill, but you asked who is more "OP". So I would say Yasuo is stronger in medium - high level play. But you are level 28, so I can see how you would be mad about Yi.

Yeah Yasuo is stronger.

yeah cause yi with
Sated + Hextech + Rageblade + Deadman is not op all.

He dives everyone and comes out without a scratch
u gotta remember that ult an the blue an red with yi lol

early to mid game, yasuo 
late game, master yi, if im playing a squishy and i see master yi pop highlander and start coming towards me, im like should i even bother running.

I would say they are both OP and BS. Yasuo however has a higher skill cap than Master Yi. Master yi is very easy to play so i think Master yi is a lot more op than Yasuo because it is a lot easier to get results out of him than when you are playing yasuo.

> [{quoted}](name=SorakaXHealBoT,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=n67N5WqG,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-12T23:32:08.302+0000)
>
> I would say they are both OP and BS. Yasuo however has a higher skill cap than Master Yi. Master yi is very easy to play so i think Master yi is a lot more op than Yasuo because it is a lot easier to get results out of him than when you are playing yasuo.

ty for agreeing with me

Yasuo is probably more OP. Double crit chance and doesn't use mana? Come on. 

About the skins, I prefer the Chosen Yi skin just having a light saber that changes colour is pretty cool. 

As for Yasuo's skins? I prefer the base skin. Too many people own the Project skin and Highnoon one is like never ever used by anyone anymore, I mean it looks ok, it looks less out of place then the Project one but isn't worth the price tag.
My friends have made the joke that if you use the Project skin it makes you play like a Bronzie, so I never bought it.

> [{quoted}](name=Buttsubushi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=n67N5WqG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-12T22:27:52.951+0000)
